dict.acceptation: 乐趣；娱乐活动；嬉戏，嬉闹；有趣的事；

sent.orig: All kids are shouting. Fun! Fun! Fun!
sent.trans: 所有的孩子都在叫喊，好玩！好玩！好玩！

sent.orig: Study first, fun second. Study in fun, fun for study.
sent.trans: 学习第一，游乐第二；寓学于乐，乐中求学。

sent.orig: Of each minute I spent with them tonight at Delaney, it was fun, fun, and fun.
sent.trans: 再者，今晚与他们一起在一间爱尔兰酒吧的每一分钟，都是顺快的。

sent.orig: Girls to have fun-and a cool cucumber facial at a birthday party provided loads of fun.
sent.trans: 女孩们只想乐一下--在生日派对上敷一次清爽的黄瓜眼膜确是乐趣多多。

sent.orig: I do it for the fun of it; he is fun to have around.
sent.trans: 我为了娱乐做事；他的娱乐广泛。
